text.div:
NameFlagsCard.TypeDescription & Constraints
Extension 0..*ExtensionExtension
Slices for extension 2..*ExtensionExtension
Slice: Unordered, Open by value:url
extension:medicationAdherence S1..1ExtensionMedication adherence code
url 1..1uri"medicationAdherence"
value[x] 1..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: Medication Adherence (extensible): This set of values contains terms representing whether a medication has been consumed according to instructions.

extension:dateAsserted S1..1ExtensionWhen the medication adherence was asserted
url 1..1uri"dateAsserted"
value[x] 1..1dateTimeValue of extension
extension:informationSource S0..*ExtensionWho provided the information about the medication adherence
url 1..1uri"informationSource"
value[x] 1..1CodeableConceptValue of extension
Binding: Information Source for Medication Adherence (example): The person or organization that provided the information about the medication adherence

url 1..1uri"http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/StructureDefinition/us-core-medication-adherence"
value[x] 0..0

Documentation for this format

name: USCoreMedicationAdherenceExtension
title: US Core Medication Adherence Extension
description: The Medication Adherence Extension is used to report whether a medication has been consumed according to instructions as reported by a patient or on behalf of the patient.
copyright: Used by permission of HL7 International, all rights reserved Creative Commons License

element.definition: Reported adherence to prescribed medication instructions.

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references). This may be any string value that does not contain spaces.

slicing.description: Extensions are always sliced by (at least) url

element.definition: An Extension

constraint.human: All FHIR elements must have a @value or children
Must have either extensions or value[x], not both

element.definition: Code stating whether the patient is consuming medications according to instructions.
